Do devs listen? No.
Is the game fun? No
Is the game balanced? No
Is the community toxic? Yes
Will i continue to play? Yes

amazing, fun, and great with friend
Rather fun game, can get kind of repetitive when playing solo, but always a load of fun when I come back to it after a break.
Toxic ass community, shit developers that don't care about what the community wants. I might play the shit out of it, but it isn't for everyone. Skip the end game chats and you might enjoy it.

TLDR; Play only if you want to get frustrated! Almost everyone is trying to get you mad somehow.

Here is what happens to me most of the times as survivor:
I have to play together with absolute bloody noobs, but i have 2,5 k and they literally play like braindead. MMR matchmaking is broken.

Either they don't do gens, or they don't rescue someone on the hook, just ignoring them.

Or they run into the basement where basement bubba is camping with 3 persons at the same time, just to get downed. Or they lure the killer to where I am doing a gen.
Or they give away your position to the killer, because they do rushed actions on purpose.
Or, or, or. The examples are countless.
You often get camped by killers. Or they are mad when the game didn't went well for them and then when they manage to down you as the gates are open, they let you bleed out, which is stealing your time on purpose. They do it just to get you mad.

As a killer this is what happens to me:
I often get SWF survivor group that behave toxic, sabotaging hooks, body blocking, running up the library on Racoon city PD and tricking you with their friends, if you don't follow them, they won't do gens.
If they manage to do all gens and get to the exit, they wait at the exit for you just to troll or teabag you. 

In short: Matchmaking is broken and people are toxic. Fun is seldom.

So why do I have 2,5 k if this game isn't fun, you ask: 

The game mechanics itself are good, but the devs do nothing to repair the flaws of it, like tunneling or camping.

I used to HAD fun, when I played together with friends or some random people from a discord server. 

But if you play as survivor with randoms you are doomed.

As I killer I am not very good (only with 1 or 2 killers, as I play surv main), and then people troll at the end gets me frustrated, why do they have to do this? Can't they just go out without teabagging, or just running in front of the gate, just to show you: Hey we did it noob? Or saying "GG" in the chat afterwards when it clearly wasn't a gg? I think this is just toxic.

So the game is a solid 7 out of 10
community is -1 from 10
Very addicting game would recommend to anyone

Sour Cherry and Pistachio Danish recipe 


Ingredients

1 3‚ÅÑ4 cups (225 g) dried sour cherries
1 1‚ÅÑ2 cups (350 ml) orange liqueur such as Cointreau or Grand Marnier
5 star anise
2 cinnamon sticks
1 dried chile de √°rbol, stemmed
Juice and finely grated zest of 1¬Ω oranges (about ‚Öì cup juice)
Kosher salt
2 large egg yolks
1 tbsp. plus 1 tsp. heavy cream
1 batch Tartine‚Äôs Croissants dough (pg. 28), prepared through Step 7
Bread flour, for dusting
1‚ÅÑ4 cup lightly toasted pistachios, cooled and crushed to a coarse powder in a food processor

Instructions

Make the cherry compote: In a small pot, combine the cherries, orange liqueur, star anise, cinnamon, chile, orange juice and zest, and a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then immediately remove. Set aside to cool completely.
Drain the cherries, reserving soaking liquid. Discard the star anise and cinnamon, and transfer the cherries and chile to a food processor. Pulse to make a coarse paste, then transfer to a small bowl and set aside.
In a separate small bowl, beat the egg yolks and heavy cream; set aside. Three hours before you are ready to serve, remove the thawed dough from the refrigerator. Place the dough on a lightly floured work surface and use a rolling pin to flatten it to a 13√ó34-inch rectangle about 1‚ÅÑ8 inch thick. Use a straight edge and a paring knife or pizza cutter to trim about ¬Ω inch from all 4 sides so that you have an even, 12√ó33-inch piece of dough. With one of the long sides facing you, lightly brush a 1-inch strip along the long side farthest from you with the egg wash. Then use an offset spatula or the back of a spoon to spread the compote evenly over the rest of the dough. Roll the dough up away from you like a jelly roll to make a log about 4 inches in diameter. Press gently on the seam to seal. Cut the log in half, wrap in plastic, and transfer to the freezer to chill before slicing, 15‚Äì20 minutes. (Or, you can freeze one or both logs for up to a week. Thaw in the refrigerator before using.)
Line 4 baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside. Place 2 racks at least 3 inches apart in the center of the oven, then preheat to 400¬∞. Set a large, wide baking dish filled with water on the floor of the oven. Remove the rolls of dough from the freezer and slice into twenty-eight to thirty 1¬º-inch-thick disks. Space the disks evenly apart on the prepared baking sheets, then place in a warm, preferably humid spot. Let rise until they are puffed, very gassy, and the layers of dough are beginning to separate, 35‚Äì45 minutes.
Once risen, brush the pastries evenly with the egg wash. Bake until evenly golden brown, 24‚Äì28 minutes. Remove and brush each with some of the reserved cherry soaking liquid, then sprinkle with crushed pistachios. Serve immediately.

This game is actually pure garbage, dont let it rope you in to keep playing as you physically cant stop, its buggy, too expensive and really boring. nothing in this game works as intended, not to mention the community is a joke and a half, the amount of toxicity in this game from the 'killer' and 'survivor' mains is unreal. needless to say save your time and money and run as far away as you can before you roped in this never ending hell called Dead By Dayligh.

huhu :) ich habe lange √ºberlegt und mich entschieden ich schreibe mal was zu diesen spiel :) also ich spiele das spiel jetzt seid 1074 Stunden und muss sagen h√§tte ich das gewusst das es so enden wird  oder so schlimm sein wird h√§tte ich mir das game nie geholt. wieso nie geholt ? ganz einfach  wenn du ins spiel startest macht es noch spa√ü aber mit der Zeit merkst du wie die Entwickler mit dem spiel umgehen die √úberlebenden haben gef√ºhlt 90 prozent die besten sachen  also ( sachen und perks) und die Killer bekommen meist den Krassen und sinnlosen nerf ( ich sag nur ruin oder das Gespenst) was passiert also? die Killer fangen an zu Tunneln und zu campen. das haben sie auch schon fr√ºher gemacht versteht mich nicht falsch aber jetzt wirds es immer schlimmer und selbst ich als √ºberlebender sage das es totaler bl√∂dsinn ist was die entwickler aus dem spiel machen  bugs oder fehler werden kaum bis garnicht behoben und wenn erst nach jahren ( ich sag nur blink bug der nurse und der trapper bug wo sie √ºber die fallen springen k√∂nnen ist immer noch seit jahren drinne) aber was ich das traurigste finde ist das das Geld den Entwiklern wohl wichtiger ist wieso ich drauf komme? ganz einfach es werden jede 3 Monate dlc herausgebracht mit neuen Killern die am ende keiner mehr spielt oder kaum ich sag nur das M√§del aus dem Brunnen oder deathslinger ^^  und ne ganze menge skins aber wie schon oben gesagt um bugs oder fehler wird sich kaum gek√ºmmert (geschweige den um die cheater die sehr lange den spa√ü verdorben haben ) au√üer es sind fehler die √úberlebende haben dann wird es meist sofort gerichtet. im gro√üen und ganzen m√ºsst ihr wissen ob ihr euch das Game holt aber ich w√ºrde es mir nicht noch einmal  holen  das Konzept ist cool :) keine frage und so an sich macht es spa√ü aber man wird sehr schnell gefrustet (besonders als killer ) wie auch immer am ende entscheidet ihr alleine was ihr kauft :)  ich bleiben bei guten story games und 7 days to die ist viel sinnvoller  bis dann und gehabt euch wohl  :D
